about_the_game:
Vor is a supermassive star, cradle of a perfectly disciplined civilization : Vorlaw.
You, are nothing but some disruptive outlaw with a toxic need for freedom.

No factions, no classes, no XP, no level up.

This is neither a classic MMORPG, nor a sandbox space journey ; Vorlaw is a Space Opera, a cooperative adventure.

One quest

Prepare carefully your final escape and try to survive by your own outside of the Vorlaw system.

The escape

There is no unique way of escaping, but none will be easy. You'll have to trade, craft, build, hunt, explore...

Cooperation

You can act as a solo smuggler, a soulless prime hunter, but eventually you'll need to set up a whole crew if you want to set up the needed infrastructure for your escape.

No private property

Everything - ships, items, resources - from anybody - npc and players - can be taken, shared or robbed. Prepare yourself to think and act as in real life.

Procedural world

Create ships, cities, armors, rules, even your own missions to guide your crew. Nothing's frozen.

The Universe

900 solar systems, 656 billion sectors. Might be enough to hide yourself from your enemies.
